This page demonstrates how to access the group mark character using the groupmark webfont. The Group Mark character is "Private Character" U+E000 in the groupmark font; the other special characters are standard unicode.

The IBM 1401 uses several special characters:

  • Lozenge: ¤
  • Group Mark: 
  • Mode Change: Δ
  • Word Separator: ⋎
  • Tape Segment Mark: ⧻
  • BCD "A": ␢ or ¢
  • Tape Mark: √
  • Record Mark: ‡
